title: The Teddy Bears' Picnic
description: Read (or sing!) your way through this picture book adaptation of the favorite teddy-bear tale, The Teddy Bears’ Picnic .If you go down in the woods todayYou'd better go in disguiseFor every bear there ever wasWill gather there for certain becauseToday’s the day the Teddy Bears have their picnic.Here’s everyone’s favorite teddy bear song with endearing pictures by the popular illustrator of Good Dog, Carl .
author: Jimmy Kennedy
